sentence.Network_en: Mr Brooke is undoubtedly in a spot of bother.
sentence.Network_cn: 布鲁克先生肯定遇到了点小麻烦。

sentence.Network_en: Undoubtedly, political and economic factors have played their part.
sentence.Network_cn: 毫无疑问，政治和经济因素在其中起了作用。

sentence.Network_en: The poverty figures were undoubtedly an embarrassment to the president.
sentence.Network_cn: 贫困数字毫无疑问让总统非常难堪。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 谁给我英语中的全部连接词_百度知道 ... in particular, 特别是， undoubtedly, 毫无疑问， absolutely, 绝对，.
4级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... underneath prep. 在…下面，在…底下 undoubtedly ad. 无疑，必定 uneasy a. 心神不安的，担心的，忧虑的.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... underneath 在...下面，在...底下 undoubtedly 无疑地，必是地 undue 过分的，过度的.
以U开头的英语单词有那些？ - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... undo 解开，打开；取消 undoubtedly 无容置疑，肯定地 unfair 不公平的.

list.abs: football undoubtedly offers an outlet for nationalism . but it also gives countries a chance to attract admiration and respect – and to define redefine their national brands .足球无疑提供了一条宣泄民族主义的途径，但也为一些国家提供了赢得钦佩和尊敬的机会，树立或重树其国家品牌。
The scars of poverty have undoubtedly left their mark ., 贫困给心灵造成的创伤毫无疑问地留下了烙印.
In this unprecedented Shanhaiguan home tide , the government undoubtedly has played a valuable role ., 而在这场史无前例的关外置业大潮中 , 政府无疑起到了抛砖引玉的作用.
英语3000... ... * You're sure to fail if you do it that way. 你那样做一定失败. 4 undoubtedly true 无可置疑的; 千真万确的.

entry.def: You can use undoubted to emphasize that something exists or is true.

example.ex: The event was an undoubted success.
example.tran: 这件事毫无疑问是成功的。
像你这样确实很有能力的人

auth_sentence.content: There were undoubtedly shocking and disturbing images from yesterday.
auth_sentence.res_content: There were undoubtedly shocking and disturbing images from yesterday.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There were undoubtedly shocking and disturbing images from yesterday.

auth_sentence.content: Doctors are undoubtedly human like the rest of us.
auth_sentence.res_content: Doctors are undoubtedly human like the rest of us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Doctors are undoubtedly human like the rest of us.

auth_sentence.content: Competing at her home Olympics was undoubtedly the highlight.
auth_sentence.res_content: Competing at her home Olympics was undoubtedly the highlight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Competing at her home Olympics was undoubtedly the highlight.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: Manufacturing's shrinking presence undoubtedly helps explain the decline in craftsmanship, if only because many of the nation's assembly line workers were skilled in craft work, if not on the job then in their spare time.
Undoubtedly American education should train more scientists and engineers.

jushi.english: There is undoubtedly a great deal of truth in what he says.
jushi.chinese: 他所说的的确大部分都是实情。
